Melissa rocked my eyebrows! For years I wanted to have pmu but Did not dare to take the step! What if I look like a monster! Melissa proved me wrong. She mastered her skills and the results Are beyond My imagination🥰🥰🥰Not only do I feel My face looks younger! I enjoyed the time during the treatment, with Melissa, chatting lots and her carefull explanations what to expect! I recommend Bi Beauti to All Women who want those awesome looking eyebrows! No more eyebrow pencils! Go get your eyebrows done and look and feel awesome🥰🤩
